There were actually many items similar to this that I was considering. I decided to go with this one because of the external weights that can be added. The external weights are great! They add a level of awareness that doesn't exist when just doing kegel exercises. There is a sense of activation and engagement that happens at the pelvic floor and up through the layers of internal muscle contraction.

I have a better understanding of how to strengthen my pelvic floor, where I am at and how to get back to a healthy strong foundation.¬†Basically when I sneeze now my muscles activate better so I don't pee myself.¬†I truly believe the training I am doing with my Kegelbell is worth the 5 minutes every-other day.

Biggest change is no more leakage. As a 40 year old with 2 kids and PCOS (poly cystic ovarian syndrome), I am pre disposed to leakage. Just this last year it started having leakage and got to the point recently I wore pads/panty liners most of the time.

Since starts Kegelbell, after the first week the leakage decreased drastically. Going into the second week on, I have not noticed leakage. It has been amazing.
